message: You could chain together your markdown template with something like ERB. So you'd create a template "index.html.markdown.erb" and use ERB tags to read and insert front matter data as markdown, which will subsequently be processed into HTML.
Not entirely sure that works in 2.0, though it will in 3.0. What I do in 2.0 is make a haml file and user the :markdown filter for markdown and normal haml for data/template/frontmatter.
